Class ServerInitializingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.ServerInitializingController

  • public class ServerInitializingController
extends java.lang.Object
    Server's initial setup view controller overseeing server & data base connection initialization. TODO provide a summary to ServerInitializingController class!!!!!

    Created on the 3rd of June, 2019.

    Author:
    Julian Broudy
